dcterms:creator: D.J. Ward
A. Mihailidis
dcterms:description: Dasher is a data entry interface that utilizes continuous gestures and language models, which was referenced in the context of exploring alternative input methods for users with speech difficulties.
dcterms:title: Dasher

dcterms:creator: W. Li
Don Fredette
Alexander Burnham
Bob Lamoureux
Marva Serotkin
Seth Teller
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on probabilistic dialogue modeling for speech-enabled assistive technology, which was evaluated in the context of improving dialogue success rates for users with high speech recognition error rates.
dcterms:title: Probabilistic dialogue modeling for speech-enabled assistive technology

dcterms:creator: V. Young
A. Mihailidis
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses the challenges faced in automatic speech recognition for dysarthric speakers, highlighting the implications for speech-based applications used by the elderly.
dcterms:title: Difficulties in automatic speech recognition of dysarthric speakers
